title: Add Bonuses in batch
content: Bonuses are the amount of money that you can add to the employee's total salary for a pay period. Click here for more information.Here are the most common situations in which you could opt for bonuses instead of premiums:Add a commission calculated elsewhere, but transferable to pay with a specific earning codeOccasional premium, such as uniform premiumEmployee expense reimbursementTo add the bonus in batch:Click on the Employee menu,Choose Add bonuses (batch),Select the employees: by the enterprise, OR by department/service OR by position,Fill in the information of the bonus to be added:Bonus date: must be a date in the pay period in which the bonus must be paidBonus type If your bonus does not yet exist, you can click on Add more Bonus Type to create itClick on Search,Check the affected employees. Select all options is available.Double-click on the Bonus box for the employee to modify,Double-click on the Note box opposite the employee to enter a note,Click on Save.If you have two or more bonuses to enter, add one type of bonus at a time in a batch. The bonus date is only useful for determining in which pay period this amount should be counted.Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
